results.content:
O início é ok. 

Esperava mais da parte final. O modelo apresentado na seção3 atende bem sistemas web dos anos 2000. Esperava apresentar algum modelo de estrutura de portais orientados a micro serviços, como ar organização de módulos como gateway, gerenciador de tokens e perfis, gerador e validador de certificados, criptografia, etc.
results.content_html:
O início é ok.

Esperava mais da parte final. O modelo apresentado na seção3 atende bem sistemas web dos anos 2000. Esperava apresentar algum modelo de estrutura de portais orientados a micro serviços, como ar organização de módulos como gateway, gerenciador de tokens e perfis, gerador e validador de certificados, criptografia, etc.

results.content: Good if one wants to have a very basic understanding of how internet works without going too deep. Also, it can be a starting point if one wants to have a deeper understanding about internet. And the web development process has a basic overview only, thus can make one wonder if there is be more.
results.content_html: Good if one wants to have a very basic understanding of how internet works without going too deep. Also, it can be a starting point if one wants to have a deeper understanding about internet. And the web development process has a basic overview only, thus can make one wonder if there is be more.

results.content: This course was good, easy to understand for beginners. But this course is incomplete it gives only web dev process overview and a detailed first process info. but other 11 processes aren't showing at all. This course is good for some basic networking terms so thats why I am giving it high ratings plus it was free... so worth trying

response.content: Thank you for your feedback. Yes this is an introductory level course. Please be sure to check out our other courses for more intermediate and advanced level topics!

results.content: Since I paid nothing for this course, I got mostly what I paid for. The main first section about how the internet works lacked depth. Again, free course, probably shouldn't have expected much. There was quite a bit they didn't go into depth about like what are get and post requests, why 301, 400, and 404 response codes, and even how an http data packet is structured. If more content is added, it might become worth while, but not as it stands now.
results.content_html: Since I paid nothing for this course, I got mostly what I paid for. The main first section about how the internet works lacked depth. Again, free course, probably shouldn't have expected much. There was quite a bit they didn't go into depth about like what are get and post requests, why 301, 400, and 404 response codes, and even how an http data packet is structured. If more content is added, it might become worth while, but not as it stands now.
